title: Warcraft Rumble Tier List
description: Warcraft Rumble is a fast-paced auto-battler game where players build teams of iconic Warcraft characters and minions to battle it out. The game features a variety of game modes, including PvP, PvE, and co-op. A tier list is a ranking of the best characters and minions in a game. It is based on the performance of the characters and minions in different game modes.
heading: Warcraft Rumble Tier List
introText: Warcraft Rumble is a fast-paced auto-battler game where players build teams of iconic Warcraft characters and minions to battle it out. The game features a variety of game modes, including PvP, PvE, and co-op. A tier list is a ranking of the best characters and minions in a game. It is based on the performance of the characters and minions in different game modes.

data.itemDescription: Huntress, Quilboar, Defias Bandits, Harpies, Darkspear Troll
General Drakkisath, Grommash Hellscream, Baron Rivendare
Murloc Raider, Mechanoegg, Zombeast, Kobold Illusionist, Leeroy Jenkins
Jaina Proudmoore, Uther the Lightbringer, Garrosh Hellscream
Dire Wolf, Acolyte of Pain, Stonetusk Boar, Netherborn Felbat, Faerie Dragon
